20101223073717.000|20101223073719.000|CC1|THIS CHANGE, OF REPEALING       
20101223073719.000|20101223073721.000|CC1|DON'T ASK, DON'T TELL.

20101223075631.000|20101223075634.000|CC1|WHAT THE PRESIDENT SAID.        
20101223075634.000|20101223075636.000|CC1|>> FIRST OF ALL, I AM GLAD      
20101223075636.000|20101223075637.000|CC1|THE DEMOCRATS AND               
20101223075637.000|20101223075638.000|CC1|REPUBLICANS CAME TOGETHER TO    
20101223075638.000|20101223075639.000|CC1|APPROVE MY TOP NATIONAL         
20101223075639.000|20101223075641.000|CC1|SECURITY PRIORITY FOR THIS      
20101223075641.000|20101223075642.000|CC1|SESSION OF CONGRESS.            
20101223075642.000|20101223075644.000|CC1|THE NEW START TREATY.

20101223080320.000|20101223080321.000|CC1|ALWAYS A SPORT.                 
20101223080321.000|20101223080322.000|CC1|AND MET ONE OF PEOPLE.          
20101223080322.000|20101223080324.000|CC1|AND WHEN WITH YOU COMPETE AT    
20101223080324.000|20101223080327.000|CC1|THAT LEVEL, YOU REALLY FEEL     
20101223080327.000|20101223080328.000|CC1|THAT YOU ARE AT THE CENTRE      
20101223080328.000|20101223080330.000|CC1|OF THE ACTIVITY THAT YOU ARE    
20101223080330.000|20101223080330.000|CC1|ENGAGED IN.                     
20101223080330.000|20101223080331.000|CC1|>> Rose: WAS THERE A POINT      
20101223080331.000|20101223080332.000|CC1|THAT YOU GAVE IT UP.            
20101223080332.000|20101223080334.000|CC1|>> YES, I GAVE IT UP IN 1958    
20101223080334.000|20101223080336.000|CC1|WHEN I WAS IN THE MIDDLE OF     
20101223080336.000|20101223080337.000|CC1|MY WORK AT HARVARD.             
20101223080337.000|20101223080338.000|CC1|>> Rose: THERE IS ALSO THIS,    
20101223080338.000|20101223080339.000|CC1|THE CELLO WHICH I MENTIONED     
20101223080339.000|20101223080340.000|CC1|WHICH IS FAMOUS THAT YOU        
20101223080340.000|20101223080341.000|CC1|TOLD ME ON THIS PROGRAM.        
20101223080341.000|20101223080341.000|CC1|>> YES.                         
20101223080341.000|20101223080342.000|CC1|>> Rose: BUT BECAUSE THIS IS    
20101223080342.000|20101223080345.000|CC1|ABOUT A MEMOIR IT IS WORTH      
20101223080345.000|20101223080346.000|CC1|TOLDING YOU HAD A GREAT         
20101223080346.000|20101223080347.000|CC1|FRIEND THAT WAS A CELLIST.      
20101223080347.000|20101223080348.000|CC1|>> RIGHT.                       
20101223080348.000|20101223080349.000|CC1|>> Rose: SHE HAD A HORRIBLE     
20101223080349.000|20101223080350.000|CC1|DISEASE.                        
20101223080350.000|20101223080351.000|CC1|>> MULTIPLE SCLEROSIS AND       
20101223080351.000|20101223080352.000|CC1|WAS TO THE GOING TO BE ABLE     
20101223080352.000|20101223080352.000|CC1|TO PLAY.                        
20101223080352.000|20101223080353.000|CC1|>> THAT'S RIGHT.                
20101223080353.000|20101223080353.000|CC1|>> Rose: AND YOU SAID TO        
20101223080353.000|20101223080354.000|CC1|HER.                            
20101223080354.000|20101223080354.000|CC1|>> YOU SHOULD TEACH.            
20101223080354.000|20101223080355.000|CC1|AND SHE SAID NO ONE WOULD       
20101223080355.000|20101223080356.000|CC1|STUDY WITH ME.                  
20101223080356.000|20101223080357.000|CC1|AND I SAID WELL, I WOULD.       
20101223080357.000|20101223080359.000|CC1|AND THE FOLLOWING DAY SHE       
20101223080359.000|20101223080400.000|CC1|CALLED ME IN LONDON AND SAID    
20101223080400.000|20101223080401.000|CC1|DID YOU MEAN WHAT YOU SAID.     
20101223080401.000|20101223080402.000|CC1|AND I SAID YES.                 
20101223080402.000|20101223080403.000|CC1|AND SHE SAID WELL I BOUGHT      
20101223080403.000|20101223080404.000|CC1|YOU A CELLO.                    
20101223080404.000|20101223080407.000|CC1|AND I SAID SUNDAY AT 3.         
20101223080407.000|20101223080408.000|CC1|I WENT ON AND HAD LISTENS       
20101223080408.000|20101223080410.000|CC1|WITH JACK LIN DUPRE WHO WAS     
20101223080410.000|20101223080412.000|CC1|THE CELLIST.

20101223080414.000|20101223080415.000|CC1|WOULD ONLY TEACH ME IF I        
20101223080415.000|20101223080416.000|CC1|PROMISED TO PLAY A CONCERT      
20101223080416.000|20101223080419.000|CC1|ON MY 50th BIRTHDAY.            
20101223080419.000|20101223080421.000|CC1|I WAS THEN 42 SO THAT SEEMS

20101223080422.000|20101223080423.000|CC1|THOUGHT SHE WOULD REMEMBER.

20101223080426.000|20101223080427.000|CC1|HUSBAND CALLS ME AND SAYS       
20101223080427.000|20101223080429.000|CC1|WHERE IS THE CONCERT.

20101223080450.000|20101223080450.000|CC1|>> Rose: THEWORLD BANK.

20101223080517.000|20101223080520.000|CC1|>> WELL, I FOUND TO BE QUITE    
20101223080520.000|20101223080522.000|CC1|HONEST A GREAT SKEPTICISM IN    
20101223080522.000|20101223080524.000|CC1|THE PRESIDENT FOR APPOINTING

20101223080538.000|20101223080540.000|CC1|OFF A DAY EVERY DAY.            
20101223080540.000|20101223080542.000|CC1|AND SO I HAD A PRETTY ROUGH     
20101223080542.000|20101223080543.000|CC1|BEGINNING BECAUSE I WAS WITH

20101223080546.000|20101223080549.000|CC1|BUT I AFTER A YEAR OR TWO OF

20101223080601.000|20101223080602.000|CC1|AND I HAD A REMARKABLE FINAL    
20101223080602.000|20101223080604.000|CC1|FIVE OR SIX YEARS AND WE        
20101223080604.000|20101223080605.000|CC1|ACHIEVED A GREAT DEAL.          
20101223080605.000|20101223080607.000|CC1|>> Rose: BUT YOU DECIDED TO     
20101223080607.000|20101223080610.000|CC1|FOCUS A LOT ON DEBT RELIEF      
20101223080610.000|20101223080612.000|CC1|WHICH HAS A HUGE IMPACT ON      
20101223080612.000|20101223080613.000|CC1|AFRICAN COUNTRIES.              
20101223080613.000|20101223080614.000|CC1|>> RIGHT.                       
20101223080614.000|20101223080614.000|CC1|>> Rose: THE ONLY PEOPLE I      
20101223080614.000|20101223080615.000|CC1|KNOW TO TALK ABOUT THAT WERE    
20101223080615.000|20101223080618.000|CC1|YOU AND BONO.                   
20101223080618.000|20101223080618.000|CC1|>> THAT'S RIGHT.                
20101223080618.000|20101223080619.000|CC1|>> THAT'S RIGHT.                
20101223080619.000|20101223080622.000|CC1|>> Rose: WHAT WAS IT ABOUT,     
20101223080622.000|20101223080623.000|CC1|WHAT DID YOU BELIEVE YOU CAN    
20101223080623.000|20101223080625.000|CC1|DO FOR THE POOR IN              
20101223080625.000|20101223080625.000|CC1|UNDERDEVELOPED COUNTRIES?       
20101223080625.000|20101223080627.000|CC1|>> WELL, FIRST OF ALL WE HAD    
20101223080627.000|20101223080627.000|CC1|AN INTERESTING THING AT THE     
20101223080627.000|20101223080628.000|CC1|WORLD BANK WHICH WAS THAT       
20101223080628.000|20101223080630.000|CC1|THERE WERE NO BAD DEBTS.        
20101223080630.000|20101223080631.000|CC1|AND YOU WERE LENDING TO THE     
20101223080631.000|20101223080632.000|CC1|POOREST COUNTRIES IN THE        
20101223080632.000|20101223080633.000|CC1|WORLD.                          
20101223080633.000|20101223080634.000|CC1|AND YET THERE WAS THE           
20101223080634.000|20101223080635.000|CC1|FICTION THAT THEY HAD TO PAY    
20101223080635.000|20101223080636.000|CC1|YOU BACK.                       
20101223080636.000|20101223080638.000|CC1|AND SO WE GOT TO A STAGE        
20101223080638.000|20101223080639.000|CC1|WHEN I WAS THERE WHEN WE        
20101223080639.000|20101223080640.000|CC1|WERE LENDING THEM MONEY IN      
20101223080640.000|20101223080641.000|CC1|ORDER TO PAY THE SAME AMOUNT    
20101223080641.000|20101223080643.000|CC1|OF MONEY BACK TO THEM.          
20101223080643.000|20101223080644.000|CC1|AND IT WAS RIDICULOUS.          
20101223080644.000|20101223080646.000|CC1|AND I SAID TO MY COLLEAGUES,    
20101223080646.000|20101223080649.000|CC1|HOW YOU CAN POSSIBLY GET AN     
20101223080649.000|20101223080652.000|CC1|EFFECTIVE DEVELOPMENT IF ALL    
20101223080652.000|20101223080653.000|CC1|THE PEOPLE DO IS TO TAKE THE    
20101223080653.000|20101223080655.000|CC1|MONEY THAT YOU ARE LENDING      
20101223080655.000|20101223080655.000|CC1|THEM TO PAY YOU BACK YOUR       
20101223080655.000|20101223080656.000|CC1|DEBTS.                          
20101223080656.000|20101223080657.000|CC1|AND IT SEEMS SO OBVIOUS BUT     
20101223080657.000|20101223080700.000|CC1|I WAS SUPPORTED BY MITCHELL     
20101223080700.000|20101223080702.000|CC1|CAMEDOES WHO WAS RUNNING THE    
20101223080702.000|20101223080703.000|CC1|FUND AFTER A CERTAIN AMOUNT     
20101223080703.000|20101223080704.000|CC1|OF DISCUSSION AND WE GOT

20101223080704.000|20101223080706.000|CC1|AND TENS OF BILLIONS OF         
20101223080706.000|20101223080707.000|CC1|DOLLARS OF DEBTS WERE           
20101223080707.000|20101223080708.000|CC1|FOREGIVEN AND THEN THE MONEY    
20101223080708.000|20101223080709.000|CC1|GOING TO THESE COUNTRIES WAS    
20101223080709.000|20101223080710.000|CC1|ABLE TO BE USED FOR

20101223080712.000|20101223080713.000|CC1|REAL PROPER DEVELOPMENTMENT     
20101223080713.000|20101223080715.000|CC1|AND I THINK WAS A VERY, VERY    
20101223080715.000|20101223080716.000|CC1|IMPORTANT CHANGE IN THE

20101223080724.000|20101223080725.000|CC1|LIVING UNDER A DOLLAR A DAY.

20101223080801.000|20101223080801.000|CC1|>> Rose: DO YOU THINK YOU       
20101223080801.000|20101223080803.000|CC1|FAILED OR DO YOU THINK YOU

20101223080828.000|20101223080830.000|CC1|BUT I THINK EVERYONE MUST

20101223080831.000|20101223080833.000|CC1|DEALS WITH THE QUESTION OF      
20101223080833.000|20101223080834.000|CC1|THE POOREST PEOPLE IN THE       
20101223080834.000|20101223080835.000|CC1|WORLD, THE WORLD NOT BE         
20101223080835.000|20101223080836.000|CC1|SAFE.

20101223080837.000|20101223080840.000|CC1|APART FROM THE HOOURN ISSUE

20101223080848.000|20101223080848.000|CC1|SUBSTANTIALLY.                  
20101223080848.000|20101223080850.000|CC1|THEY WILL HAVE 10% OF THE       
20101223080850.000|20101223080851.000|CC1|INCOME OF THE PEOPLE IN         
20101223080851.000|20101223080852.000|CC1|CHINA AND INDIA.                
20101223080852.000|20101223080854.000|CC1|AND MAYBE 2 OR 3% OF THE        
20101223080854.000|20101223080857.000|CC1|INCOME THAT WE HAVE IN THE

20101223080858.000|20101223080900.000|CC1|AND THERE WILL BE 2 BILLION     
20101223080900.000|20101223080900.000|CC1|OF THEM.                        
20101223080900.000|20101223080902.000|CC1|SO THIS IS AN ISSUE WHICH IS    
20101223080902.000|20101223080904.000|CC1|NOT JUST FOR ME AS A DREAMER    
20101223080904.000|20101223080905.000|CC1|OR SOMEONE WHO IS INVOLVED      
20101223080905.000|20101223080907.000|CC1|IN DEVELOPMENT IT IS AN         
20101223080907.000|20101223080909.000|CC1|ISSUE THAT ALL OF US NEED TO    
20101223080909.000|20101223080910.000|CC1|LOOK FORWARD TO AS AN ISSUE     
20101223080910.000|20101223080913.000|CC1|OF STABILITY ON THE PLANET.     
20101223080913.000|20101223080916.000|CC1|>> Rose: AND TELL ME WHY,       
20101223080916.000|20101223080921.000|CC1|COULD YOU, IF YOU HAD HAD       
20101223080921.000|20101223080922.000|CC1|MORE SOMETHING HAVE

20101223080924.000|20101223080925.000|CC1|I MEAN WERE THE THINGS THAT

20101223080928.000|20101223080930.000|CC1|THAT WOULD HAVE MADE A          
20101223080930.000|20101223080931.000|CC1|DRAMATIC DIFFERENCE THAT YOU    
20101223080931.000|20101223080932.000|CC1|COULD NOT DO FOR REASONS        
20101223080932.000|20101223080933.000|CC1|BEYOND YOUR CONTROL?            
20101223080933.000|20101223080935.000|CC1|>> I HAD THE GREAT PRIVILEGE    
20101223080935.000|20101223080937.000|CC1|OF SPENDING NINE YEARS GOING

20101223081535.000|20101223081536.000|CC1|>> WELL, I HOPE VERY MUCH       
20101223081536.000|20101223081539.000|CC1|THAT THEY'RE RIGHT.             
20101223081539.000|20101223081541.000|CC1|IT SEEMS TO ME TO BE A HIGH     
20101223081541.000|20101223081542.000|CC1|RISK GAME BUT I HOPE VERY       
20101223081542.000|20101223081544.000|CC1|MUCH THAT THEY'RE RIGHT.

20101223082204.000|20101223082205.000|CC1|THAT HAD NOT GOTTEN IN          
20101223082205.000|20101223082205.000|CC1|BEFORE.

20101223082207.000|20101223082208.000|CC1|>> RIGHT.
